english.segment1: It's not a family trait, it's nothing that I ate, and it didn't come from skating with Holy Rollers. It's an early warning sign, it keeps my life in line, but it's so hard to define. Nevermind..
english.segment2: It's just a spirit thing, it's just a holy nudge, it's like a circuit judge in the brain. It's just a spirit thing, it's here to guide my heart, it's just a little hard to explain.
english.segment3: It pushes when I quit, it smells a counterfeit, sometimes it works a bit like a teleprompter. When it's teleprompting you, i'll pray you'll let it through, and i'll help you with the how. but for now..
english.segment4: It's just a spirit thing, it's just a holy nudge, it's like a circuit judge in the brain. It's just a spirit thing, it's here to guide my heart, it's just a little hard to explain.
english.segment5: I took the long way, bent back down again, Some things will never. ever be explained. no they can not be explained.. yeah
english.segment6: It's just a spirit thing, it's just a holy nudge, it's like a circuit judge in the brain. It's just a spirit thing, it's here to guide my heart, it's just a little hard to explain. (3 times)
